name: Your Final Days
storyline:
In a distant future where all the world's resources have been wasted, corrupting the planet because of humanity's negligence, it is up to a small robot named Orb to purify the earth and give humanity a second chance.

The objective is simple, he must head to one of the four locations avaiable, then find the corruption and purify it.

But it won't be so easy, as Orb is not strong enough to confront it, the only way to succeed is to explore, find upgrades and defeat enemies to level up, only then will he be able to face the corruption.

However, Orb's weapons will consume his resources, when they're all used, he will be defenseless, time is also a dangerous foe as he can only explore at Night, without the Ozone layer the sun rays will harm him.

Orb can't afford to waste time, as he has limited days before his battery fully depletes, leaving it lifeless.

The odds are stacked against him, will he be able to turn the tables and succeed?
summary: A NES-Like action game where a small robot, Orb, has to venture through four locations to get stronger and fight the corruption, on a strict time limit, while paying extra attention to resource management.
